casebody.data:
William R. McCOMB, Administrator of the Wage and Hour Division, United States Department of Labor, Appellant, v. ROW RIVER LUMBER COMPANY, a corporation, Appellee. No. 12154. United States Court of Appeals Ninth Circuit. March 6, 1950. See also 177 F.2d 129. William S. Tyson, Solicitor, U. S. Dept. of Labor, Bessie Margolin, Asst. Sol., William A. Lowe, Joseph M. Stone and E. Gerald Lamboley, Attorneys, Washington, D. C., Kenneth C. Robertson, Regional Attorney, San Francisco, Cal., for appellant. No other appearances were entered.

Before MATHEWS and BONE, Circuit Judges, and MATHES, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the District Court is affirmed.
